notes.text:
This update for kubernetes1.23 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-25743: Fixed sanitization of raw data of escape, meta or control sequences before output it to terminal (bsc#1194400)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: kubectl does not neutralize escape, meta or control sequences contained in the raw data it outputs to a terminal. This includes but is not limited to the unstructured string fields in objects such as Events.
notes.title: CVE description
